mapper.insert: insert INTO lifeTip(num, userId, subject , category , content, register_date , hitCount) VALUES(#{num}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{category}, #{content}, SYSDATE , 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE lifeTip SET hitCount = hitCount+1 WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.select: SELECT num, l.userId, subject , category , content, TO_CHAR(register_date, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') created , hitCount , userName ,profileImg , profileMsg FROM lifeTip l LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT userId , userName FROM member1 ) m ON l.userId = m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN memberprofile p ON l.userId = p.userId WHERE num= #{num}

SELECT num, subject ,userId FROM lifeTip
AND (num > #{num})
ORDER BY num ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT num, subject FROM lifeTip
AND (num < #{num})
ORDER BY num DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE lifeTip SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} , category=#{category} WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lifeTip(replyNum, num, userId, content, register_date) VALUES (lifeTipReply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{userId}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
